alert.note: Alert for Carter; Fallon (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 06 at 2:23AM MDT until April 06 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Carter and Fallon. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions with slick snow covered roads. Areas of blowing snow could reduce visibility below a mile at times, and may create local whiteout conditions. The combination of wet snow and strong winds will be dangerous for young livestock.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be slick, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
